original_text: Thy prophets have seen vain and foolish things for thee: and they have not discovered thine iniquity, to turn away thy captivity; but have seen for thee false burdens and causes of banishment.
korean_text: 네 선지자들이 네게 대하여 헛되고 어리석은 묵시를 보았으므로 네 죄악을 드러내어서 네가 사로잡힌 것을 돌이키지 못하였도다 그들이 거짓 경고와 미혹하게 할 것만 보았도다

sentences.original_text: Thy prophets have seen vain and foolish things for thee:
sentences.korean_translation: 네 대언자들이 너를 위하여 헛되고 어리석은 것들을 보았으며

sentences.original_text: and they have not discovered thine iniquity,
but have seen for thee false burdens
sentences.korean_translation: 도리어 너를 위하여 거짓 무거운 짐을 보았으며
